TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelInitializer

Docs.summary: Defines the interface to notify a service or client when a channel is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Defines the interface used to inspect and add state to channels when they are first created. This can be used to track all outstanding sessions, for instance, so the service can send messages on them. Add service channel initializers to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.ChannelInitializers%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection. Add client channel initializers to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ChannelInitializers%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel channel) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes the class with a specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel>.
